name: Mito
headline: Cursor for data analysis
description:
Mito is Cursor for data science. We’re building an AI enabled IDE to 10x the productivity of data people. Data analysts use Mito to automate reports without relying on internal engineering resources. 

Mito is used by thousands of business analysts, data scientists, and automation engineers at some of the world's largest banks, private equity shops, and consulting firms. 

Open source is key to our enterprise sales strategy. Mito is open source and built on top of Jupyter. That means getting started with Mito is as simple as running `pip install` and doesn't require enterprises to manager new infrastructure. 

Check us out at: https://www.trymito.io/
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:analytics; industry:open-source; industry:data-science; location:new-york

founders.name: Aaron Diamond-Reivich, Founder
founders.description:
Hey! I'm a UPenn Alum where I studied computer science and management. I'm building low-code data science software for the next 1M data analysts with my best friend and twin brother. 

Excited to learn from & with other YC founders. Say hi!

founders.name: Jake Diamond-Reivich, Founder
founders.description: Jake graduated with a BS in Finance @ Wharton. Before founding Mito, he helped launch a global personalization analytics tool at SAP. He's our head of growth, and manages our open source community as well as our sales pipeline.

# Jupyter Extensions That Help You Work Faster.
## The world's largest companies save hours per week with Mito's AI copilot and spreadsheet editor.
[Install Mito](http://trymito.io/<https:/docs.trymito.io/getting-started/installing-mito>)
## Trusted by dozens of fortune 500 companies
![Accenture](http://trymito.io/customers/accenture.png)
![Cisco](http://trymito.io/customers/cisco.png)
![Deloitte](http://trymito.io/customers/deloitte.png)
![Ericsson](http://trymito.io/customers/ericsson.png)
## AI Chat
Chat is like collaborating with a colleague who sees your code, knows your data, and is a Python expert. Its ChatGPT integrated directly into Jupyter.![](http://trymito.io)![AI Chat](http://trymito.io)[Learn more about Mito AI →](http://trymito.io/</python-ai-tools>)| 
## Spreadsheet Editor
Write spreadsheet formulas like VLOOKUP, build pivot tables, and create graphs. Every edit is automatically converted to Python.![](http://trymito.io)![Spreadsheet Editor](http://trymito.io)[View 100+ transformations →](http://trymito.io/<https:/docs.trymito.io/how-to/importing-data-to-mito>)  
---|---  
## Smart Debugging
Fix your code with the click of a button and let the AI explain your error to you.![](http://trymito.io)![Smart Debugging](http://trymito.io)| 
## Code Completions
Autocomplete that finishes your thought. No more googling syntax or correcting typos.![](http://trymito.io)![Code Completions](http://trymito.io)  
## AI Chat
Chat is like collaborating with a colleague who sees your code, knows your data, and is a Python expert. Its ChatGPT integrated directly into Jupyter.
![](http://trymito.io)![AI Chat](http://trymito.io)
[Learn more about Mito AI →](http://trymito.io/</python-ai-tools>)
## Spreadsheet Editor
Write spreadsheet formulas like VLOOKUP, build pivot tables, and create graphs. Every edit is automatically converted to Python.
![](http://trymito.io)![Spreadsheet Editor](http://trymito.io)
[View 100+ transformations →](http://trymito.io/<https:/docs.trymito.io/how-to/importing-data-to-mito>)
## Smart Debugging
Fix your code with the click of a button and let the AI explain your error to you.
![](http://trymito.io)![Smart Debugging](http://trymito.io)
## Code Completions
Autocomplete that finishes your thought. No more googling syntax or correcting typos.
![](http://trymito.io)![Code Completions](http://trymito.io)
## Install [open-source](http://trymito.io/<https:/github.com/mito-ds/mito>) Mito in two simple steps
```
$ pip install mitosheet
```

Copy!
![](http://trymito.io)![Clipboard](http://trymito.io)
```
$ pip install mito-ai
```

Copy!
![](http://trymito.io)![Clipboard](http://trymito.io)
Then, check out our [documentation](http://trymito.io/<https:/docs.trymito.io/how-to/creating-a-mitosheet>) and [discord.](http://trymito.io/<https:/discord.gg/XdJSZyejJU>)
![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/Wealth Management Case Study.png](http://trymito.io)| ![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/special events.png](http://trymito.io)![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/recon.png](http://trymito.io)  
---|---  
![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/python training.png](http://trymito.io)![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/common mistakes.png](http://trymito.io)| ![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/enigma.png](http://trymito.io)  
![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/Wealth Management Case Study.png](http://trymito.io)
![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/special events.png](http://trymito.io)
![](http://trymito.io)![/case-studies/recon.png](http://trymito.io)
## All in Jupyter, Streamlit, and Dash
Mito is a Jupyter extension and Streamlit component, so you don't need to set up any new infrastructure. Get started with Mito in seconds. It's easy as pip install mitosheet.
Mito is a Jupyter extension, so you don't need to set up any new infrastructure. You can use Mito in JupyterLab, Jupyter Notebooks, JupyterHub, SageMaker and more.
![Use Mito in Jupyter or Streamlit](http://trymito.io)
## Upgrade Python scripts to interactive Streamlit Dashboards
Turn one hour of automation savings into tens of hours by sharing automation scripts through Streamlit dashboards.
[Learn more about Mito in Streamlit →](http://trymito.io/</data-app>)
![](http://trymito.io)![Bank Performance Comparison](http://trymito.io)[Bank Performance Comparison](http://trymito.io/<https:/bank-performance.streamlit.app>)
Import and explore data from Snowflake
[View Code →](http://trymito.io/<https:/github.com/mito-ds/snowflake-streamlit-bank-performance-demo>)
#Finance #Snowflake
![](http://trymito.io)![Data Quality Verification](http://trymito.io)[Data Quality Verification](http://trymito.io/<https:/mito-data-cleaning-demo.streamlit.app>)
Pass checks before exporting data
[View Code →](http://trymito.io/<https:/github.com/mito-ds/data-cleaning-demo>)
#Data Cleaning
![](http://trymito.io)![Basic Spreadsheet Demo](http://trymito.io)[Basic Spreadsheet Demo](http://trymito.io/<https:/mito-for-st-demo.streamlit.app>)
Explore the Mito spreadsheet component
[View Code →](http://trymito.io/<https:/github.com/mito-ds/mito-for-streamlit-demo>)
#Data Exploration #Data Cleaning
## Ready to write Python code 4x faster?
[Install Mito](http://trymito.io/<https:/docs.trymito.io/getting-started/installing-mito>)
[or see Pro plans →](http://trymito.io/</plans>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
### Is Mito open source?
![](http://trymito.io)![Open FAQ](http://trymito.io)
### Is Mito free?
![](http://trymito.io)![Open FAQ](http://trymito.io)
### How do I install Mito?
![](http://trymito.io)![Open FAQ](http://trymito.io)
### Can I use Mito to automate my spreadsheet tasks?
![](http://trymito.io)![Open FAQ](http://trymito.io)
### Can I use Python to view a spreadsheet?
![](http://trymito.io)![Open FAQ](http://trymito.io)

generated_description:
**Mito: Revolutionizing Data Analysis with AI**

Founded in 2020 and a proud Y Combinator Batch S20 graduate, Mito is carving a niche in the data analysis landscape. Their mission? To serve as the "cursor" for data scientists and analysts by dramatically improving productivity through smart automation.

At its core, Mito is an AI-enhanced Integrated Development Environment (IDE) designed to simplify and accelerate the workflow of data professionals. Users, from business analysts to automation engineers, leverage Mito to automate report generation—saving countless hours typically spent wrangling data or waiting for engineering resources. It's no wonder that some of the world's largest banking institutions, private equity firms, and consulting agencies have adopted this tool.

What makes Mito especially appealing is its open-source nature. Built on top of Jupyter, a beloved platform among developers and data scientists, getting started with Mito is as easy as a simple `pip install`. This means that companies can seamlessly integrate Mito into their existing infrastructure without the headache of new setups.

Located in New York, Mito is a small yet potent team of three, led by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner. Their focus is firmly on key themes like artificial intelligence, developer tools, analytics, and open-source data science technology.

Mito offers a suite of products designed to streamline various tasks:
- **Mito Spreadsheet**: Write spreadsheet formulas, create pivot tables, and generate graphs—all while Mito converts your actions into Python code.
- **Mito AI**: An intelligent co-pilot that aids in data tasks and provides insights based on your input.
- **Low-Code SQL**: Makes SQL queries accessible to those who may not be proficient in SQL.
- **Data Apps**: Facilitates the transformation of scripts into interactive dashboards, effectively turning automation into a shareable tool.

Their clientele boasts notable Fortune 500 companies, including Accenture, Cisco, Deloitte, and Ericsson, all of whom have reported significant time savings thanks to Mito's capabilities.

In a world overflowing with data, Mito is presenting a much-needed solution—one where data professionals can not only keep pace but substantially elevate their analysis efforts. If you're interested in leveling up your data game, you can learn more and get started at [Mito](http://trymito.io).

---

In summary, Mito has positioned itself as a vital ally for data professionals, making complex tasks not just manageable, but downright intuitive. Their commitment to open-source innovation and practical solutions reflects a deep understanding of the challenges faced by organizations across various industries today.
